ModMetaData.name: [SIC] Miscellaneous Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: Sicarious
ModMetaData.description: Incorporates a variety of small patches that address balance issues, weird design choices and other bugbears. Includes: - Wield Without Violence: Non-violent pawns can equip weapons, even though they can't use them to attack. - Ideology Apparel: Buffs or tweaks many useless items to try give them a niche, rather than being strictly inferior or identical to a basegame item. - Turret Adjustments: Makes turrets, especially Autocannons and Uranium Slug Turrets, a lot more powerful, but a lot more expensive to operate. - Ideology Seating: Tweaks the beauty of Pews and Kneel Sheets to make them vaguely comparable with Kneel Pillows. - Ideology Flooring: Makes steel flooring (Spikecore Plates and Hex Tiles) cleaner, but also more work-expensive. - Drape Rendering Patch: Makes Drapes render on the same layer as columns rather than rendering over the top of tall objects placed in front of them. - Merge Pots: Removes Bonsai Pots from the game, but allows Bonsai Trees to be planted in Plant Pots (if Tree Sowing has been researched.) - Draw Infestation Numbers: when the Draw Infestation Chance debug option is selected, the beauty drawer draws infestation score instead of beauty.
